product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Whole Life Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal allowed completely or partially during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: LongLife Goal III is a Whole Life ULIP designed to provide lifelong market-linked wealth creation along with insurance cover, plus the option of generating a retirement income stream through the Retired Life Income feature.
key_highlights: Whole life insurance cover till age 99
Two variants: With Waiver of Premium or Without Waiver of Premium
Option to receive Retired Life Income (RLI) for retirement goals
Loyalty Additions every year from 10th to 25th policy year (if premium < ₹10 Lakhs)
Periodical Return of Waiver of Premium Charges (PROWC)
Multiple equity, debt and index fund options
Option to reduce premium during term

plan_variants.variant_name: LongLife Goal III Without Waiver of Premium
plan_variants.suitable_for: Customers seeking pure wealth + life cover without disability waiver benefit

plan_variants.variant_name: LongLife Goal III With Waiver of Premium
trigger_conditions: Accidental Permanent Total Disability of Life Assured (if LA = Policyholder)
Death or accidental disability of Policyholder (if LA ≠ Policyholder)
plan_variants.benefit: Future premiums waived, policy continues with all benefits

core_benefits.details: At maturity (age 99), Fund Value as on maturity date is payable provided policy is in force.
On death during policy term, nominee receives higher of: Prevailing Sum Assured, Fund Value, or Guaranteed Death Benefit.
core_benefits.special_rule: Sum Assured reduced by withdrawals in last 2 years.
core_benefits.wop_variant_extra: If WOP already triggered, death benefit increases by PV of future waived premiums discounted at 4%.

core_benefits.eligibility: Applicable only if Annualized Premium < ₹10 Lakhs

addition_schedule.Year 10–14: 4% of one annualized premium each year

core_benefits.details: All mortality charges deducted are returned back into fund value at intervals.
core_benefits.first_addition: Later of age 60 or end of 15th policy year

core_benefits.benefit_name: Periodical Return of Waiver of Premium Charges (PROWC)
core_benefits.details: All WOP charges deducted are returned back into fund value at intervals.
Policyholder can opt to receive periodic income withdrawals from fund value during retirement years while staying invested.
core_benefits.income_basis: Chosen percentage of fund value (example shown at 8%)

premium_reduction.details: Regular/Limited premiums can be reduced during policy term

portfolio_strategies: Wheel of Life Portfolio Strategy II

riders.rider_name: Bajaj Life Linked Accident Protection Rider II
Bajaj Life Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

surrender_benefit.during_lock_in: Fund value transferred to Discontinued Policy Fund after discontinuance charge
surrender_benefit.wop_triggered_special: PV of future waived premiums payable at surrender (discounted at 4%)

compliance_guardrails.ulip_lock_in_rule: No liquidity allowed in first 5 years as per IRDAI ULIP guidelines.
compliance_guardrails.death_floor_rule: Guaranteed death benefit = 105% of premiums paid.
compliance_guardrails.variant_lock: Variant must be chosen at inception and cannot be changed later.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing laws.

retrieval_chunks.text: LongLife Goal III offers two variants: with Waiver of Premium and without Waiver of Premium, selectable only at inception.
Loyalty Additions apply yearly from policy year 10 to 25 for premiums below ₹10 Lakhs, ranging from 4% to 7%.
PROMC returns mortality charges back to fund value starting from age 60 or year 15, then every 10 years, last at maturity.
Retired Life Income option allows periodic income withdrawals while fund remains invested till age 99 maturity.
Death benefit is higher of sum assured, fund value, or guaranteed minimum of 105% total premiums paid.
